short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable the auto scoll after answer sumbmission on WebAssign.net

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By default, after submitting an answer on WebAssign.net, it will scroll to a seeminly unpredictable location on the page. With this extension enabled, it disables WebAssign.net's auto scroll feature after submitting an answer and will automatically scroll back to the question you just answered after submitting.
